inAppFreeROMs.description: Allows downloading free ROMs directly in the app. Disabled for App Store builds.

romPathMigrator.description: Enables ROM path migration functionality. Currently disabled for all builds.

cheatsUseSwiftUI.description: Uses the new SwiftUI interface for the cheats management system

retroarchBuiltinEditor.description: Enables the built-in RetroArch editor. Disabled for App Store builds.
